nodes.display_name: 海盗女王：一个被遗忘的传奇
nodes.long_description:
在《海盗女王：一个被遗忘的传奇》中展开波涛汹涌的历史之旅 。

在这款叙事性冒险游戏中，您将成为史上最令人尊敬和畏惧的海盗--郑一嫂。
欣赏知名女演员刘玉玲对郑一嫂的精彩演绎，由备受好评的电影制作人和创意导演埃洛伊丝 幸格执导。

从一个籍籍无名之辈，一步步爬到令人闻风丧胆的红旗舰队船长的位置。让我们一起回顾她是如何在那个充满挑战的夜晚，排除万难，最终成为杰出领袖。
探索月光下的船舱，攀爬缆绳，解开谜题以战胜对手，发挥您的智慧夺取舰队的控制权。

这并不是一款典型的动作海盗游戏，而是富有沉浸感的叙事体验，等待着喜欢沉浸在故事中，另一个时空，成为历史上最强大海盗的玩家。游戏出色的视觉效果，氛围音效设计，以及精心研究的历史背景，让玩家身临其境，置身于清朝时期中国南海的心脏地带。

 
 	
《海盗女王》已斩获诸多声誉卓著的奖项，包括2023年的翠贝卡故事景观奖以及2021年的雨舞发现奖。来体验这款深受评论家和玩家喜爱的游戏吧！这款游戏以电影的叙述方式讲述了一个几乎被遗忘的传奇故事，并精准再现了其历史环境，获得业界的广泛认可。

登上船只，准备扬帆起航，开始一场关于发现、坚韧和力量的冒险旅程。虽然海洋充满了危险，但所得的回报也同样丰厚。你是否具备成为海盗女王的勇气和实力呢？
nodes.short_description: 《海盗女王》是一部屡获殊荣的叙事冒险体验，刘玉玲领衔主演。登上一艘 19 世纪的中国海盗船，揭开一个被遗忘的传奇故事。探索月光下的船舱，解开谜题，发掘隐藏的文物，踏上成为史上最强大海盗的旅程——你是否具备成为海盗女王的勇气和实力呢？

nodes.display_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
nodes.short_description:
The Pirate Queen is a Emmy-nominated narrative adventure starring Lucy Liu. Climb aboard a 19th century Chinese pirate ship and uncover the story of a forgotten legend. 🌟

Explore moonlit cabins, unearth hidden artefacts and embark on an epic journey to become the most powerful pirate of all time — Do you have what it takes to be crowned The Pirate Queen? 🏴‍☠️👑

node.display_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu

nodes.display_name: The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend
nodes.long_description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend. 

This narrative-driven game invites you to step into the boots of the most feared and respected pirate of all time, Cheng Shih.

Experience a captivating performance from renowned actress Lucy Liu, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, and the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer. 

From humble beginnings to the helm of the infamous Red Flag Fleet, navigate through the trials and tribulations on the night Cheng Shih came to power. 
Explore moonlit cabins, climb rigging, solve puzzles to outsmart adversaries and exercise your wit to seize control of the fleet.

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative, for those who love to lose themselves in a story, crave the thrill of stepping into another time and place, and are eager to chart their course as the most powerful pirate in history. The game's stunning visuals, atmospheric sound design, and meticulously researched historical context will transport you to the heart of the South China Sea during the Qing dynasty.

Celebrated for its cinematic narrative and historically accurate environments, the game has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) and the Raindance Discovery Award (2021). 

Climb aboard and prepare to set sail on a journey of discovery, resilience, and power. Do you have what it takes to become The Pirate Queen?
nodes.short_description: The Pirate Queen is a multi-award winning narrative adventure starring Lucy Liu. Climb aboard a 19th century Chinese pirate ship and uncover the story of a forgotten legend. Explore moonlit cabins, solve puzzles, unearth hidden artefacts and embark on a journey to become the most powerful pirate of all time — Do you have what it takes to be crowned The Pirate Queen?

nodes.change_log: Please find our full Privacy Policy here: https://www.thepiratequeengame.com/privacypolicy
